ruleset.name: PRTracker rule set
ruleset.description:
TooManyFields: This rule limits the maximum number of fields (instance variables) in a class. Here, the maximum value is set to 40. ExcessivePublicCount: This rule is excluded, so it will not apply. It concerns an excessive number of public methods and variables in a class. ExcessiveClassComplexity: This rule is also excluded. It checks if a class's complexity (number of methods and instance variables) is too high. Superglobals: This rule is excluded. It concerns the use of PHP superglobals, such as $_GET, $_POST, etc. CouplingBetweenObjects: This rule limits coupling between objects (the number of classes a class is linked to). Here, the maximum value is set to 20. ShortVariable: This rule concerns variable names that are too short. Here, it is modified to allow the variable names "id" and "qb" as exceptions. UnusedFormalParameter: This rule is excluded. It checks if a method has formal parameters not used in its body.
Lastly, there are exclusion patterns that prevent these rules from being applied to certain specific files or folders:
src/Migrations src/Kernel.php src/Security
